tool_description: Access data for UK properties, include previous sale prices and registered leases.
name: UK Property Data
title: UK Property Data

api_list.name: GetEnergyPerformanceCertificate
api_list.description: Returns an Energy Performance Certificate for a specific property.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-property-data.p.rapidapi.com/propertytools.api.v1.Public/GetEnergyPerformanceCertificate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-property-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ListProperties
